title: Dustman's Cairn: Wuuthrad Fragment and the Word YOL
session_summary: Elitrof entered Dustman's Cairn solo to recover the Wuuthrad fragment. He cleared the Silver Hand cell occupying the dungeon, defeated a Draugr Overlord in the deepest chamber, and recovered the fragment. He also discovered a Word Wall and learned YOL (Fire Breath, first word). Emerged from the cairn at dawn with the fragment in hand.
key_events: Silver Hand cell encountered and engaged in the dungeon
Draugr Overlord defeated in the deepest chamber
Word Wall discovered; YOL (Fire Breath, word 1) learned
Fire Breath used (unmastered; FP spent) in critical duel with the Overlord
Silver Hand survivor escaped — vendetta clock ticks
Milestone: x2 Minor — retired Pack Tactics; promoted Ulran-Vjarn Pelt to Artifact Extra (L1/3)
loot_acquired: Wuuthrad Fragment (Quest Item) — recovered from Dustman's Cairn
notes: End-of-session state: Elitrof FP 2 (Refresh 1; keeps higher). Physical stress boxes 1 and 3 marked. No consequences. Word Wall YOL learned; Fire Breath Mastery clock starts at 1/8. Ulran-Vjarn pelt promoted to Artifact Extra (L1/3). Pack Tactics retired. Silver Hand survivor escaped — Silver Hand Vendetta clock ticked.
next_session_prep: Departure from Dustman's Cairn at dawn with fragment
Road travel to Whiterun; possible Silver Hand road encounter
Return fragment to Jorrvaskr; Kodlak reaction and Inner Circle reveal?
